title: Ice Age National Scenic Trail: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park          The Ice Age National Scenic Trail is not your 'typical' park. It is almost 1,200 miles long and crossed the state of Wisconsin north to south and east to west.  The trail changes with every season and is a great way to explore a great state.   Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn about the Ice Age National Scenic Trail, view pictures and see what's going on.
